_header: Jesu was born in Bethlehem Iudea / Of maid Mary thus find we
_description: A carol for Epiphany — eleven quatrains (aaab) and burden: ‘The sterre hym schon bothe nyght & day / To lede thre kynges ther our lord lay’

BLSl2593.First Lines:
Jhesu was born in bedlem judeOf mayde mary thus fynde
                    we…
BLSl2593.Last Lines:
…God saf vs fro the peynis of helle& fro the wykkynd
                    fyndes pray
BLSl2593.Editions:
Greene,  Richard Leighton.

         4. London: Richards, 1856: 40-2.
Fehr,  Bernhard. 
             “Die Lieder des HS. Sloane 2593.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und

         109 (1902): 33-72: 54-5.

NLWPork10.First Lines:
Jhesu whas borne in bedlem judeAlle off a mayden so fyndythe
                    whe…
NLWPork10.Last Lines:
…And yne the depyste pytte he fellAnd ther he ys foreuer &
                    ay
NLWPork10.Note: 10 stanzas, most differing from the text of London,  British Library Sloane 2593.
